name: Home keys
description: Quite useful when you want to come back home.

name: Unkown dungeon key
description: A key that an old man gave you. It is supposed to open an ancient dungeon door, but the old man passed away before he could tell you where the dungeon is...

name: Random effect potion
description: Impossible to know what it will to do before drinking it... Let's just hope it won't kill you

name: Healing potion
description: Potions are getting a whole lot more costful these days... Use it wisely!

name: Ancient spell collection
description: Even though it is supposed to be a collection, the pages are so damaged that it may only contain one spell. What a waste...

name: Genius wizard spell parchment
description: A parchment written by hand by the best living wizard. Reading it will make you unlock a new spell instantly!

name: Philosopher essay
description: A short book that will make you think, for once. Maybe you'll learn new skills thanks to it?

name: Science manual
description: Just a book filled with scientific concepts and exercises to understand these. That's what they use in big universities!

name: Rock solid stones
description: Quite logical, you'd tell me... But that means they can be used as a building material!

name: Finest wood
description: At least, that's what the seller told you...
